projectGridLines.title: OASIS Software Product Development
projectGridLines.description:
Description: OASIS is an integrated restaurant management SaaS that addresses the core industry

problems to maximize sales and optimize costs across the value chain of restaurants and cafes. The

product focusses on the business owner's perspective enhancing customer experience, reducing

people dependency and streamlining processes along with generating intelligent and actionable

insights for different user groups of the product.

You will be working as an intern in the close-knit and lean team responsible for shipping the MVP of

OASIS.

Skill sets: C# .NET (Most preferred) / Java / Node js, React/Angular, Database Handling, Web

Application development, DSA, Problem solving, Debugging, REST APIs, Clean Code

Bonus skillsets: Fullstack development, Understanding of UX/UI Design (Figma)

Traits expectation: Ownership, Self-driven, Ability to learn and implement new technologies in an

agile environment, Eager to Solve Challenging problems, Adaptive to Fast paced startup environment,

previously worked on industry level short-term projects

Expected learning: As part of the OASIS team, you will get extensive exposure to and practical

learnings related to Software Architecture, Backend development, Testing, Deployment, Fullstack

development, Product development, Direct learning and interaction with Founders, Building enterprise

products from ground up, Azure Cloud
